updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with NSclient
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with NSclient
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)
2. Enable log levels tcp trans_event 1 user 3 httpmod httpreq 4 httpauth 5 
3. Generate traffic ( please use a simple GET if possible so we can search the log consistently)
4. (optional) authentication steps
5. Collect transaction events
6. Compared with expected results
7. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with IPSEC/GRE + NsClient passive mode
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with IPSEC/GRE + NsClient passive mode
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Set feature flag to disabled. The lookup will be skip.
2. Set steering configuration as traffic type: all (On-prem)
3. Set a source location bypassed in exception for on-prem
4. Not set the same source location bypassed in exception for off-prem (all web traffic)
5. Send traffic from that specific source location
6. Check log. The traffic should NOT be bypassed. Since the Lookup will be skip

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with IPSEC/GRE + SAML + IP surrogate
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with IPSEC/GRE + SAML + IP surrogate
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Set feature flag to disabled. The lookup will be skip.
2. Set steering configuration as traffic type: none (On-prem)
3. Set a source location bypassed in exception for on-prem
4. Not set the same source location bypassed in exception for off-prem (all web traffic)
5. Send traffic from that specific source location
6. Check log. The traffic should be bypassed.

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with IPSEC/GRE + SAML + Cookie surrogate
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with IPSEC/GRE + SAML + Cookie surrogate
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Set feature flag to disabled. The lookup will be skip.
2. Set steering configuration as traffic type: auto generated (On-prem)
3. Set a source location bypassed in exception for on-prem
4. Not set the same source location bypassed in exception for off-prem (all web traffic)
5. Send traffic from that specific source location
6. Check log. The traffic should NOT be bypassed. Since the Lookup will be skip

updated_cases.title: Verify that the fields are only populated when TE v4 is enabled
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that the fields are only populated when TE v4 is enabled
updated_cases.custom_steps:
The fields should only be populated when "transaction-event-format":{"version":4} is set
 in the feature_config.json
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication

updated_cases.title: Verify the behavior when feature is configured incorrectly through feature_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the behavior when feature is configured incorrectly through feature_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Set "transaction-event-format":{"version":four} in the feature_config.json
2. No errors should be seen.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication

updated_cases.title:
Verify the behavior during restart when feature is configured as enabled through feature 
config and disabled through per tenant config
updated_cases.custom_summary:
Verify the behavior during restart when feature is configured as enabled through feature 
config and disabled through per tenant config
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. No errors should be seen.
2. Feature config should be read correctly
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication
